sent.orig: Photocopy of the Intern's Educational Certificates and photocopy of the Bio-Data of the Intern's Passport.
sent.trans: 实习教育证明吗，是什么东西，实习护照就是我们所办的护照吗？

sent.orig: The Business Center services offers, such as IDD and DDD, Typing, photocopy, Fax and Express Mail.
sent.trans: 提供以下服务：长途电话、打字、复印、传真、特快专递、代售邮票、代发信件等。

sent.orig: You must photocopy the spreadsheet on A3 paper.
sent.trans: 我们应当订购一些A3型有抬头的便笺纸。

sent.orig: You can not take them home, but you can photocopy a particular article you want.
sent.trans: 您不能借回家，但可以复印您要的那一篇文章。

sent.orig: This photocopy machine is not working properly.Could you check out the problem?
sent.trans: 这台复印机不正常工作了，你检查一下好吗？
